content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, respond to parts a, b, and c. Describe one argument made in the passage. Explain how a piece of evidence from the passage supports one of the author’s claims. Explain how one development during the late 1600s and the 1700s shaped the changes described in the passage.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, respond to parts a, b, and c. Describe one argument made in the passage. Explain how a piece of evidence from the passage supports one of the author’s claims. Explain how one development during the late 1600s and the 1700s shaped the changes described in the passage.

topic.text: 3.3: Continuities and Changes to Economic Practice and Development

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
